trans-unit.source: Determines if the operation should be retried and how long to wait until the next retry.
trans-unit.target: Determines if the operation should be retried and how long to wait until the next retry.

trans-unit.source: The number of retries for the given operation.
trans-unit.target: The number of retries for the given operation.

trans-unit.source: A value of zero signifies this is the first error encountered.
trans-unit.target: A value of zero signifies this is the first error encountered.

trans-unit.source: The status code for the last operation.
trans-unit.target: The status code for the last operation.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:System.Exception</codeEntityReference> object that represents the last exception encountered.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:System.Exception</codeEntityReference> object that represents the last exception encountered.

trans-unit.source: The interval to wait until the next retry.
trans-unit.target: The interval to wait until the next retry.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.Protocol.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object for tracking the current operation.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.Azure.Batch.Protocol.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object for tracking the current operation.

trans-unit.source: <codeInline>true</codeInline> if the operation should be retried; otherwise, <codeInline>false</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: <codeInline>true</codeInline> if the operation should be retried; otherwise, <codeInline>false</codeInline>.
